DOC.brief_summary: The investigators evaluated clinical impact of reduced heparin responsiveness (HRreduced) on the incidence of perioperative myocardial infarction (MI) and restenosis at 6 months after off-pump coronary artery bypass graft surgery (OPCAB) and identified its predictors.
DOC.criteria: enrolling all consecutive patients scheduled for elective isolated multivessel OPCAB between April 2007 and March 2008 presence of known preoperative coagulopathy, emergency operation or preoperative use of an intraaortic balloon pump.
DOC.keyword: Off-pump coronary artery bypass graft surgery
